data.name: The Black Hole
data.detailed_description:
The Black Hole is a TPS with puzzle solving elements. You'll play as a secret agent in the Black Hole Agency.

Defeat enemies with your gun and solve puzzles.
Collect mysterious items in the levels and survive a conspiracy.

Encounter various traps, enemies, and puzzles.

Let’s enter the world of secret agents!
data.about_the_game:

data.short_description: The Black Hole is a TPS with puzzle solving elements. You'll play as a secret agent in the Black Hole Agency. Defeat enemies with your gun and solve puzzles. Collect mysterious items in the levels and survive a conspiracy.
data.supported_languages: English, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, French, Spanish - Spain, Korean, Japanese, Portuguese - Brazil, German

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 64 Bit / Windows 8 64 Bit / Windows 10 64 Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GTX 650
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 64 Bit / Windows 8 64 Bit / Windows 10 64 Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 3.4 GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 960
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 15 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Frequent Violence or Gore, General Mature Content.
